mapper.insert: MERGE INTO yquiz1 USING dual ON (y_id = #{y_id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET y_name = #{y_name} ,sex = #{sex}, country_name = #{country_name}, city_name = #{city_name}, y_date = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (y_id, y_name, sex, country_name,city_name, y_date, y_number) VALUES (#{y_id},#{y_name},#{sex},#{country_name},#{city_name},sysdate, y_number_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select * from yquiz1 order by y_date desc
select bb.* from (select rownum as rn, aa.* from (select * from yquiz1 order by y_number DESC) aa) bb where bb.rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
